body:
Hi!

The Avicus senior staff will be holding a little party on TeamSpeak for anyone in the community to join. We will be playing a fun little game of Cards Against Humanity, and we possibly may include a neat map testing through the mapdev server. Feel free to reach out and suggest anything you want to play at this little community party.

Keep in mind we can't do any giveaways, due to iffy permissions. This party will be taking place on TeamSpeak, at 3PM EST on Saturday January 23rd, 2016.
